title: Travels in lands beyond the sea.
author: Linskill, Charles Dorrance.
snippet: "Late on Tuesday night a porter, in the employ of the North London Railway Company, found the body of a respectably dressed man lying on the rails in the Dalston Junction Station. The poor fellow was terribly  mutilated, and most probably had been run over by more than one train.

title: Travels in Lands beyond the Sea. Beauty and Glory of Western Europe, etc
author: Linskill, Charles D.
snippet: " Late on Tuesday night a porter, in the employ ofthe North London Railway Company, found the bodyof a respectably dressed man lying on the rails in theDalston Junction Station. The poor fellow was terribly mutilated, and most probably had been run overby more than one train.
